info.sjis: 召喚獣トロッコに乗車の際には 足下に十分ご注意下さい
info.ascii: Please watch your step when boarding the Summon rail car.

portrait_l.name: child
portrait_l.sjis: 村の外には、はぐれが いっぱいいるから 出ちゃいけないんだよ
portrait_l.ascii: There are a lot of Strays outside the village, so we can't leave.

portrait_l.name: child
portrait_l.sjis: でも、いつか旅立つ日が来るのよ
portrait_l.ascii: Someday, when I'm strong enough, I'll go on a journey.
